column2: "Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw. Hom ntow ndwom fofor mma EWURADZE
column3: Na n'ayɛyi wɔ n'ahotseweefo ehyiadzi no mu."

column2: "Wɔmma Israel ndzi ehurusi wɔ nyia ɔyɛɛ no no mu: Wɔmma Zionmba hɔn enyi ngye hɔn Hen ho."
"Wɔmma wɔmfa asaw nyi ne dzin ayɛw: Wɔmma wɔmfa mpintsin na nsankutsen ntow n'ayɛyindwom."
"Na EWURADZE n'enyi ka ne man ho: Ɔdze nkwagye bɛhyehyɛ abrɛfo."
"Wɔmma ahotseweefo nhyehyɛ hɔnho wɔ enyimnyam mu: Wɔmma wɔntow enyigye ndwom wɔ hɔn mpa do."
"Wɔmma Nyankopɔn n'ayɛyi a ɔkrɔn ntsena hɔn anomu
column3: Na afona anofanu nkitsa hɔn nsamu;"
Na wɔdze dadze mpokyerɛ atoto hɔn etsitsir;"

column2: "Dɛ wɔdze atsɛmbu a wɔakyerɛw no bobu hɔn: Enyidzi yi na n'ahotseweefo nyinara wɔ. Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
